sections.heading: to 62-5-11 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1998, ch. 108, § 81 repealed 62-5-1 to 62-5-11 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1941, ch. 84, §§ 7, 11, and 13, relating to the operation of the public utility commission, effective January 1, 1999. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1997 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
